name: places/ChIJyXeyF50Z2jERLCUAdtLbZ4M/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURvdXRiMWxRRRAB
text: {'text': "Awesome and amazing experience at zouk. We hosted a private event there and everything was superb. The staff was incredibly attentive, and the venue's ambiance was vibrant and inviting. A special shout out to William Koh, whose exceptional coordination and attention to details. From initial planning to the end of the event, William went above and beyond to help us to ensure everything ran smoothly. Not to mention, he also shared with us his experience of what could go wrong and anticipated our needs as well as handled every aspect with grace and efficiently. Really appreciate William and his entire team for the supports!!!", 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': "Awesome and amazing experience at zouk. We hosted a private event there and everything was superb. The staff was incredibly attentive, and the venue's ambiance was vibrant and inviting. A special shout out to William Koh, whose exceptional coordination and attention to details. From initial planning to the end of the event, William went above and beyond to help us to ensure everything ran smoothly. Not to mention, he also shared with us his experience of what could go wrong and anticipated our needs as well as handled every aspect with grace and efficiently. Really appreciate William and his entire team for the supports!!!", 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJyXeyF50Z2jERLCUAdtLbZ4M/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUN3bDd1dFNREAE
text: {'text': "Zouk advertises the event from 10pm to 4am but the main DJ plays music at 1am. The staff attitude is very rude, shouting at foreigners like us. And when I entered, I didn't know that inside this bar smoking of electronic cigarettes is prohibited, there was no sign or any reminder when I entered, the security guard outside checked my bag and knew I had it and didn't see any reminder, when I entered, I used it once and the staff snatched it from my hand. I think they just kept it to prevent me from smoking inside again. And after a while, I left and asked again if I could have it back, the staff said they threw it away. They could have reminded me the first time without throwing away the customer's things (Other 5 star restaurants also don't throw away the customer's things like that, they just remind). When going around, the staff chased away and shouted at the customer. The first experience at the bar was terrible. If it was just confiscating and throwing away the e-cigarette, I wouldn't say anything because that's bar policy, but I have to rate the attitude and service of the bar, discriminating against customers who bought tickets. Terrible!", 'languageCode': 'en'}
originalText: {'text': "Zouk advertises the event from 10pm to 4am but the main DJ plays music at 1am. The staff attitude is very rude, shouting at foreigners like us. I think they just kept it to prevent me from smoking inside again. And after a while, I left and asked again if I could have it back, the staff said they threw it away. They could have reminded me the first time without throwing away the customer's things (Other 5 star restaurants also don't throw away the customer's things like that, they just remind). When going around, the staff chased away and shouted at the customer. The first experience at the bar was terrible. If it was just confiscating and throwing away the e-cigarette, I wouldn't say anything because that's bar policy, but I have to rate the attitude and service of the bar, discriminating against customers who bought tickets. Terrible!", 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJyXeyF50Z2jERLCUAdtLbZ4M/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURnejdLbzV3RRAB
text: {'text': 'Good job to the cleaner for keeping the toilet clean! Music was kinda boring and chill on a Wednesday night.\nIt’s great that the bartender was friendly and introduced us to their drinks menu.  Cocktails was awesome highly recommend their lychee martini.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

Cocktails was awesome highly recommend their lychee martini.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJyXeyF50Z2jERLCUAdtLbZ4M/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUN3MTZxRnlBRRAB
text: {'text': 'Today I flew from Vietnam to here to listen to music I waited from 10pm to 4am. Ok no problem. But I have something to say about the attitude of your female security guard towards customers. She yelled at me many times with foreign guests like us. We have worked very hard to come here to listen to music and wanted to experience good and fun entertainment, but the attitude is too bad. We came here from far away, it was very difficult and the spirit of loving DJ music. I hope that you will change the way you treat guests, be polite and have a civilized attitude.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

I hope that you will change the way you treat guests, be polite and have a civilized attitude.', 'languageCode': 'en'}

name: places/ChIJyXeyF50Z2jERLCUAdtLbZ4M/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURmODgtYTBBRRAB
text: {'text': "I’ve had the pleasure of being served by Mhelvin, a club VIP host at Zouk Singapore, and I can confidently say he goes above and beyond to make every experience memorable. From the moment we step into the club, Mhelvin ensures everything is seamless and that we’re treated like VIPs. He’s incredibly attentive, always checking in to make sure we’re having a great time, and he’s quick to address any needs we may have—whether it's ensuring we have a perfect table or recommending the best drinks to suit our group’s vibe.\n\nWhat really sets Mhelvin apart is his genuine hospitality. He doesn’t just see us as another group of partygoers; he remembers us, knows our preferences, and consistently delivers a top-tier experience. It’s rare to find someone who’s both professional and personable in the nightlife scene, but Mhelvin strikes the perfect balance. His dedication and effort to go the extra mile make him a standout promoter, and because of him, Zouk has become one of my favorite places to go out in Singapore. Highly recommend working with him if you’re planning a night out there!", 'languageCode': 'en'}
